description: Try our easy to follow Sticky Char Siu Pork & Broccolini Stir-Fry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sticky Char Siu Pork & Broccolini Stir-Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup Lee Kum Kee Sauce Char Siu
1 tbs Hong Gong Shao Hsing Wine

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sauces, shao hsing, garlic and ginger in a bowl. Place pork in a separate bowl, then add 1 tbs sauce mixture and stir to coat.
Cook rice following absorption method on packet. Add broccolini. Stand, covered, for 5 minutes or until bright green and tender.

Meanwhile, heat a wok over high heat. Add 1 tsp oil and swirl to coat. Add one-third of the pork mixture to wok. Stir-fry for 2 minutes or until just cooked through. Transfer to a bowl and cover. Repeat, in 2 batches, with oil and remaining pork.
Wipe wok clean, if necessary. Return wok to high heat, add remaining oil and swirl to coat. Add pork and remaining sauce mixture, then stir-fry for 2 minutes or until pork is sticky.
Remove broccolini from rice and cover to keep warm. Stir 1 tbs sesame seeds into rice. Divide among bowls, top with pork, broccolini, coriander, chilli and remaining sesame seeds.
